decision_conditions: The four garage doors on the front elevation of the garages hereby approved shall be constructed in stained hardwood in accordance with the detailed design indicated on drawing number TP2.001 Revision A, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The doors shall not open out across the footpath.  Reason: To ensure that the development does not harm the character and appearance of the Acton Green Conservation Area, in accordance with policies 4.1, and 4.8 of the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan 'Plan for the Environment' 2004 and the Acton Green Conservation Area Management Plan (September 2007). | No windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the garages hereby permitted, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.  Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties and the visual appearance of the area, in accordance with policies 4.1, 4.8, and 5.9 of the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan, 'Plan for the Environment' (2004). | The garages shall only be used for domestic purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the main dwelling known as 41 South Parade, Chiswick, W4 1JS, and not for any separate residential use or for any industrial, commercial or business use.  Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupiers of neighbouring properties and to retain adequate parking for the main dwelling, in accordance with policies 4.1, 4.8, 5.5, 5.9 and 9.1 of the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan 'Plan for the Environment' (2004).
description: Retention of two double garages including bike storage and plant room (Amendment to planning permission ref: PP/2008/4810)
